about_the_game:
Start growing ornamental flowers on your farm. Mix plants to achieve new color combinations and increase the visual appeal of your crops.

Package includes:

The mechanics of creating new flower colors: mix two species of a flower to get a new, unique blend
New crops - five types of ornamental flower crops (crocuses, hydrangeas, peonies, roses and tulips) in four base colors (white, red, yellow and blue)
New decoration items - Fifteen decoration items (hedges, flower arches, flower pots, ornamental shrubs, a miniature windmill and a bench)
New Building - Plant Nursery introducing the key mechanics of blending flowers
